features: SHINE & VOLUME: Oat is the first ingredient in this scalp-soothing, farm-fresh inspired shampoo infused with apple cider vinegar to clarify the scalp and add high shine and volume to dull hair
CLARIFYING BLEND: Infused with apple cider vinegar, this shampoo cleanses and reinforces shine from root to tip. It's free of sulfates, dyes & parabens & safe for all hair types & color treated hair
FARM FRESH INSPIRED: We make hair care products that promote healthy hair & scalp, from shampoo & conditioner to hair masks, leave-in milks, mists & oils
SOOTHING PROPERTIES: We've been a trusted household brand since 1945. We're best known for our skin & hair care products, where oat's soothing properties are put to work on body, face and scalp
body.description: We believe that beautiful hair starts at the root. Soothe and clarify your scalp while adding high shine and volume to your strands with this farm-to-shower inspired Apple Cider Vinegar Shampoo. With oat as the first ingredient, this sulfate-free shampoo helps promote a healthy scalp environment. Infused with apple cider vinegar, its unique formula cleans and clarifies your scalp while adding healthy shine to oily and dull hair. Free from sulfates, parabens and dyes, this daily clarifying shampoo is safe for color-treated hair and features a sensational, fresh fragrance. We source our oats from a quiet mill located along the rolling hills of the Mississippi River Valley, in a small town where pride and quality go hand-in-hand. We love the way we feel when everything is in balance. That's why we start with oat as the first ingredient. Each farm fresh blend helps to soothe your scalp and nourish strands from root to tip. Discover blends made with simple ingredients, from simpler times.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Face Cleanser with Soothing Oat Cleanse skin with Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Facial Cleanser with soothing oat, designed to moisturize for softer, smoother, healthier-looking skin. This daily moisturizing face wash nourishes dry skin and leaves skin feeling hydrated. From a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand, the easy-to-rinse cleanser removes dirt, oil, and other impurities & leaves skin feeling soft and supple. The Soothing Oat Formula is designed to leave skin feeling hydrated. We proudly source our oat flour in a purposeful way to help preserve its purity; oats are Non-GMO. This daily facial cleanser is fragrance-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, soap-free, and dye-free and is in a bottle sourced from at least 30% post-consumer recycled plastic. For best results, wet skin with lukewarm water and apply the soothing oat cleanser in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse and follow with Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Face Cream. Aveeno Apple Cider Vinegar Shampoo + Conditioner We believe that beautiful hair starts at the root. Soothe and clarify your scalp while adding high shine and volume to your strands with this farm-to-shower inspired Apple Cider Vinegar Shampoo. With oat as the first ingredient, this sulfate-free shampoo helps promote a healthy scalp environment. Infused with apple cider vinegar, its unique formula cleans and clarifies your scalp while adding healthy shine to oily and dull hair. Free from sulfates, parabens and dyes, this daily clarifying shampoo is safe for color-treated hair and features a sensational, fresh fragrance. We source our oats from a quiet mill located along the rolling hills of the Mississippi River Valley, in a small town where pride and quality go hand-in-hand. We love the way we feel when everything is in balance. That's why we start with oat as the first ingredient. Each farm fresh blend helps to soothe your scalp and nourish strands from root to tip. Discover blends made with simple ingredients, from simpler times. Aveeno Positively Radiant Skin Brightening Exfoliating Daily Facial Scrub Aveeno positively Radiant skin brightening exfoliating face scrub, gently remove impurities for softer, brighter, more even-toned skin with Aveeno positively Radiant skin brightening daily Scrub. This brightening facial scrub gently exfoliates skin and helps improve tone, texture, and clarity to reveal brighter, more radiant skin. It's designed to help improve dullness and blotchiness, so your skin looks and feels fresh. The unique formula of this gentle face scrub combines moisture-rich soy extract with naturally derived granules to exfoliate while you cleanse. The face scrub is also made with Jojoba and Castor oils, for skin that is softer, brighter and more even-toned. The soap-free formula is hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic, and gentle enough for sensitive skin and everyday use. Aveeno Repairing CICA Foot Mask with Prebiotic Oat and Shea Butter Pamper your feet with Aveeno Repairing CICA Foot Masks. These foot mask slippers are enriched with shea butter and prebiotic oat—known to have soothing and nourishing properties—to intensely moisturize and help repair extra-dry skin, leaving your feet visibly soft, smooth, and healthy-looking. From a dermatologist-recommended brand, these non-drip CICA foot masks are formulated to be gentle enough for sensitive skin and are both paraben- and fragrance-free. The moisturizing slippers are easy to use: Simply wash and dry your feet, wear the foot masks for approximately 10 minutes, and remove—no need to rinse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the girls with course, dry hair…
reviews.reviewText: This product is AMAZING! I honestly believe that my hair has never felt as hydrated steer a washing then when I use this shampoo and conditioner! Like, my hair just held the water longer than normal which is a huge plus when trying to comb and detangle. The smell is also very nice, I know that the Apple cider vinegar may say otherwise, but the fragrance is very pleasant. At least try it out for the one time to see if it helps your hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It works nice! But, left my dry brittle hair with lots of static!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars not for dry or frizzy hair
reviews.reviewText: At least it made the dryness and frizzy of my hair worse. Everyone’s hair reacts differently. It did smell nice and was smooth on my hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use it on my kids. Actually cleans.
reviews.reviewText: I personally like the scent. My kids don't seem to care one way or the other. But I saw this at the store and decided to give it a try because my oldest was having a serious scalp issue (almost like dandruff but it seemed extreme - like large flakes that reminded me of cradle cap...but on a 12 yr old) and I wanted to rule out malassezia. I had read that apple cider was good at fighting fungus. I did a tea tree treatment on her scalp and then I washed it out with the Aveeno Apple Cider Vinegar and it worked wonders. No more flakes. I was so happy with the results that I found the shampoo on amazon and now it's on our subscribe and save subscription. This all happened over a year ago and we're still routinely using this product.I can't say for sure if it was this shampoo or hormones or what that got rid of the flakes but it certainly cleanses well, and the conditioner moisturizes well, on all my kids. The price for the set is very reasonable. I'll likely be continuing to purchase this until it's no longer on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exactly what I needed it to do!
reviews.reviewText: I bought and used this:got2b Metallics Silverwhich made my blonde hair gun-metal gray (seriously very dark!) so I thought I would try a clarifying shampoo / conditioner and voila! I got just what I wanted - silverish gray so I could see what my new growth would look like as it grows out. I am so happy with this lighter gray! I wish I had taken before and after pics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and Damaging to Hair
reviews.reviewText: The ingredients in this ACV shampoo have left my hair feeling extremely dry and hard (dead-like) every wash within seconds of application and after rinsing. The only way to somewhat undo this bad effect has been to use excessive amounts of the conditioner each wash session, and even then, the quality of the conditioner is very watery/cheap—nothing like the Shea Moisture brand. It’s like I took my hair right from flowy, healthy and luscious straight to weak, dry and brittle within weeks. It’s worked for others, just not my hair type. Also, 1/4 of the shampoo content was lost to waste due to a wide crack across the bottom of the bottle—shipping management precaution. Not worth the change in brand or the investment for me personally.
